lead_paragraph: India's contribution to the British war effort has been tremendous. How much greater it might have been had it not been for the policy of non-cooperation and limited civil disobedience advocated by Gandhi, and adopted by the powerful All India Congress, it is impossible to say.
abstract: Ed on All-India Cong party policy modification
